description: Dr. Humza Akhtar is a Principal in the Industry Solutions Team at MongoDB, designing Industry 4.0 solutions for the manufacturing and energy sector. Prior to joining MongoDB, he was working at Ernst & Young Canada as a Senior Manager in digital operations consultancy practice. Humza attained his Ph.D. at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, and worked with the Singapore manufacturing industry for a number of years on Industry 4.0 research and implementation. He has spent most of his career enabling smart and connected factories for many manufacturing clients.
